edges.head: Rb 掺杂
edges.tail: 降低 TiO2 氧空位形成能
edges.evidence: Rb doping and epitaxial strain synergistically reduce the oxygen vacancy formation energy... leads to an exponential increase in oxygen vacancy concentration.

edges.head: 降低 TiO2 氧空位形成能
edges.tail: 增加 TiO2 氧空位浓度
edges.evidence: Rb doping and epitaxial strain synergistically reduce the oxygen vacancy formation energy... leads to an exponential increase in oxygen vacancy concentration.

edges.head: 晶体-非晶界面拉伸应变
edges.evidence: tensile strain from 0 to 3%... oxygen vacancy formation energy gradually decreases... suggesting that strain is an effective means of increasing oxygen vacancy concentration.

edges.head: 降低氧空位形成能
edges.evidence: tensile strain from 0 to 3%... oxygen vacancy formation energy gradually decreases... suggesting that strain is an effective means of increasing oxygen vacancy concentration.

edges.head: Rb 掺杂
edges.evidence: Rb doping based on a 3% lattice strain further reduces the oxygen vacancy formation energy to a negative value, ensuring the spontaneous formation of oxygen vacancies.

edges.head: 晶格畸变和拉伸应变
edges.evidence: Rb doping based on a 3% lattice strain further reduces the oxygen vacancy formation energy to a negative value, ensuring the spontaneous formation of oxygen vacancies.

edges.head: 氧空位形成能为负值

edges.head: Rb 掺杂 TiO2
edges.evidence: binding energies of Ti 2p3/2 and Ti 2p1/2 for Rb-TiO2/TB shift positively... confirming the modulation of Rb doping on the electronic structure.

edges.head: 调节电子结构
edges.evidence: binding energies of Ti 2p3/2 and Ti 2p1/2 for Rb-TiO2/TB shift positively... confirming the modulation of Rb doping on the electronic structure.

edges.head: 氧空位
edges.evidence: oxygen vacancies with localized electrons play a key role in hole scavenging... directly act as sacrificial electron donors (SEDs) to capture photoinduced holes.

edges.head: 提供局域电子
edges.evidence: oxygen vacancies with localized electrons play a key role in hole scavenging... directly act as sacrificial electron donors (SEDs) to capture photoinduced holes.

edges.head: 作为牺牲电子供体
edges.evidence: oxygen vacancies with localized electrons play a key role in hole scavenging... directly act as sacrificial electron donors (SEDs) to capture photoinduced holes.

edges.head: 氧空位
edges.tail: 作为有机吸附物解离位点
edges.evidence: oxygen vacancies can serve as reaction sites for the dissociation of organic adsorbates... oxygen vacancies act as reaction sites to promote the dissociative adsorption of DEG... hole scavenging rate is positively correlated with the number of DEG chemisorbed.

edges.head: 作为有机吸附物解离位点
edges.tail: 促进 DEG 解离吸附

edges.head: Rb 掺杂和拉伸应变
edges.evidence: Rb doping and epitaxial strain synergistically reduce the oxygen vacancy formation energy and promote the chemical adsorption of diethylene glycol (DEG) on the TiO2 surface for hole scavenging.

edges.head: 协同增加氧空位
edges.tail: 增强 DEG 在 TiO2 表面化学吸附
edges.evidence: Rb doping and epitaxial strain synergistically reduce the oxygen vacancy formation energy and promote the chemical adsorption of diethylene glycol (DEG) on the TiO2 surface for hole scavenging.

edges.head: 增强 DEG 在 TiO2 表面化学吸附
edges.evidence: Rb doping and epitaxial strain synergistically reduce the oxygen vacancy formation energy and promote the chemical adsorption of diethylene glycol (DEG) on the TiO2 surface for hole scavenging.

edges.head: 化学吸附 DEG
edges.tail: 作为高效牺牲电子供体
edges.evidence: chemisorbed DEG is more effective in scavenging holes... Chemisorbed DEG acts as the efficient SED to rapidly scavenge holes... Ti4+ is reduced to Ti3+ by photogenerated electrons after the scavenging of holes.

edges.head: 作为高效牺牲电子供体
edges.evidence: chemisorbed DEG is more effective in scavenging holes... Chemisorbed DEG acts as the efficient SED to rapidly scavenge holes... Ti4+ is reduced to Ti3+ by photogenerated electrons after the scavenging of holes.

edges.head: 引起可逆颜色变化

edges.head: Ti3+ 中间能级与 d-d 跃迁
edges.evidence: Ti3+ introduces intermediate energy levels... d-d transitions... enhance the absorption in the visible region... result in an absorption minimum in the blue region, which explains the dark blue color.

edges.evidence: DPSi... to enable monodispersity of the nanoparticles (NPs) in polar solvents and provide cross-linking sites for hybridization.

edges.evidence: APSi which possesses the acrylate structure acts as the site for the hybridization cross-linking reaction, facilitating the construction of a homogeneous and transparent Rb-TiO2/TB-CS/acrylate photochromic hybrid film.

edges.head: 提供丙烯酸结构

edges.head: 拉伸应变
edges.tail: 破坏 TiO2 八面体对称性
edges.evidence: the blue shift of the Raman peak... represents the disruption of lattice periodicity and octahedral symmetry, which is directly related to surface oxygen defects... tensile strain promotes the formation of oxygen vacancies.

edges.head: Rb-TiO2/TB

edges.head: 湿度升高
edges.tail: H2O 在氧空位解离吸附增加
edges.evidence: With increasing humidity, the color-switching reversibility weakens, which is attributed to the increased dissociative adsorption of H2O on oxygen vacancies, reducing the hole scavenging ability.

edges.head: Rb-TiO2/TB-CS 纳米分散液
edges.evidence: nanodispersion exhibits a significant optical modulation amplitude exceeding 90% at 650 nm, rapid response within 60 s, and stable reversibility in color-switching (50 cycles).

edges.evidence: Rb-TiO2/TB-CS/HEC composite film was obtained for photochromic reversible writing... can be used as reversible printing paper for short-term reading, such as temporary labels and confidential documents.

edges.tail: DEG 作为牺牲电子供体
edges.evidence: MB solution with Rb-TiO2/TB-CS completely fades after 120 s... followed by gradual color recovery... indicating that MB is reduced to colorless LMB by photogenerated electrons and oxidized back to MB by O2.

edges.head: TiO2 掺杂低价金属离子
edges.evidence: doping of the low-valent metal ions generates an effective positive charge... oxygen vacancies are spontaneously formed by a charge compensation mechanism... thus maintaining the charge neutrality of the material.

edges.head: 通过电荷补偿机制

edges.head: Rb+ 半径较大
edges.tail: 引起晶格畸变与局部配位改变
edges.evidence: Rb has a larger ionic radius, which may cause lattice distortions thereby altering the coordination environment to decrease the migration barrier for oxygen atom transfer and surface exchange.
